original_text: Think about this: The Son of Man will go up again to the place where he was before. And you will see him go up. Will you agree to that?
korean_text: 그러면 너희는 인자가 이전에 있던 곳으로 올라가는 것을 본다면 어떻게 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man will go up again
to the place where he was before.
And you will see him go up.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그가 올라가는 것을 볼 것입니다.
